attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am starting this petition to stop the government from robbing the ordinary people of another hidden tax...as if we dont pay enough already?

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/scrapairtax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
